general.question: Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
general.answer: Yes, you can change your shipping address within 24 hours of placing the order. Contact our support team to update your address.

general.question: How can I track my order?
general.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'Order History' section.

general.question: What payment methods are accepted?
general.answer: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

support.question: I received a damaged item, what should I do?
support.answer: If you receive a damaged item, please contact our support team with a photo of the damage, and we will arrange for a replacement or refund.

support.question: How do I return an item?
support.answer: To return an item, please fill out the return form available in your account and send the item back to us using the provided return label.

support.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
support.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime through your account settings or by contacting our support team.

order-issues.question: What should I do if I didn’t receive my order?
order-issues.answer: If you haven’t received your order within the expected delivery time, please contact our support team for assistance.

order-issues.question: My order status is ‘pending,’ what does that mean?
order-issues.answer: A ‘pending’ status means that your order is being processed and will be updated once it has been shipped.

order-issues.question: I was charged incorrectly, how can I get a refund?
order-issues.answer: If you believe you were charged incorrectly, please contact our support team with your order details, and we will investigate and process a refund if necessary.
